text: Or when he found cock-fighting going on in church? Laud made a positive approach. and so was the office of a bishop. Altars should be altars and not any broken down, transportable table which was handy for the most improbable uses..
handwritten_text: Or when he found cock-fighting going on in church? Laud made a positive approach. and so was the office of a bishop. Altars should be altars and not any broken down, transportable table which was handy for the most improbable uses..
